<Text: Muck (gambling):  In poker, it most often refers to the pile of discarded cards into which players may throw their folded hands, and into which the dealer may place burned cards.>

Text: Muck (gambling):  This is why many players will place a chip or other object on their cards: it helps to prevent errant cards from entering their hand.
Triplets:<Muck

<Text: Muck (gambling):  Sometimes they are referred to as card covers, card guards or card protector.>
